amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for hazardous fuel reduction in forests by $6 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the funding (by transfer) for Wildland Fire Management accounts by $6 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hooley (OR) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 241 (Roll no. 250).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Hooley (OR).
